title: E-Learning Safety and Health Training for Migrant Workers: Practical Safety Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Korean Communication Skills and Understanding of General Workplace Safety Protocols
context.additional_context: Designing visual/interactive content for multicultural learners, optimized for mobile devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three safety risk factors that may occur in industrial settings and explain preventive measures
Learners can interpret five core OSH-related legal requirements by referencing materials in Korean and their native language
Learners can perform emergency response procedures in a virtual simulation environment with over 80% accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
